Package fr.theshark34.supdate

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DownloadAndUnzipTask
    The Download Task A Task that download and unzip a zip file
    Downloader
    The Downloader Multi Threaded downloader
    DownloadTask
    The Download Task A Task that download a file
    FileIgnorer
    The FileIgnorer This class contains a method to get a list of files to keep when deleting the useless files.
    FileToUpdate
    A File To Update A Class to stock the informations of a file that need to be downloaded / unzipped / removed
    OnlineFile
    An Online File A Class to stock the informations of an online file given by the Server
    Server
    The Server util class Contains a method to send a request to the server
    SUpdate
    The main class Initialize it with the url of the update folder and the output folder to start updating !
    Util
    An Util class A Class containing some usefull methods
    ZipFile
    A Zip File A class containing the infos of an online zip file : His name, and a file of it that will be checked to know if we need to download the zip.
